title: The Cultivator's Corn Grill under the Thunder
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, cinematic lighting, full body portrait of an ancient, wise, bearded street vendor, wearing dark, ornate traditional Xianxia robes and carrying a sheathed sword, grilling several glowing corn cobs on a small charcoal brazier. He holds a large black umbrella over the stall. The scene is set on a dark, wet, stone-paved street in an ancient Chinese/Xianxia city during a heavy, dramatic rainstorm at night. Intense lightning illuminates the sky and the towering multi-tiered pagodas in the background. Warm light emanating from the corn grill contrasts strongly with the cool, blue tones of the rain and wet cobblestones.
